258102.「待ちかねたぞ 護りの手よ！: I've been waiting for you, Hand of Protection!

258103.「余の生みだした 芸術的なヒズミは\n ぞんぶんに 楽しんでもらえたかな？:
I hope you have enjoyed my artistic creations
as much I did.

258104.「ほざけッ！ 姑息な手ばかりを……。\n 恥という言葉を 知らんようだな！！:
To hell with you! Always with your tricks...
you don't even know the meaning of the word,
"shame"!

258105.「ああ！ なんと なげかわしい！\n 余の芸術を解する 審美眼が ないと見える。:
Oh, my! Such an attitude you have! You seem to
lack the aesthetic sense needed to appreciate
my art.

258106.「黙れッ！ ここで 白黒つけてやる。: Shut up! I'll put an end to this here and now.

258107.「はやるでない。\n 忘れたのか？ 滅びの手の本分は\n ヒズミを 生むことにあ:
Not so fast. Have you forgotten? The purpose
of the Hand of Perdition is to create
distortions.

258108.「そこで 趣向をこらしてみた。: So, I decided to put a quaint twist on it.

258109.「見よ！ 最大級のヒズミである！\n 時間をかけて 上昇するよう しかけておいた:
Behold! The largest distortion you've ever
seen! I've set it to rise up over time.

258110.「あれが 創生の渦に 接触すれば\n 渦が ヒズミのチカラを 何倍にも増幅する。:
When it comes in contact with the Creatorium, the vortex will amplify the distortion's power many times over. The God of Destruction will
be summoned in an instant!

258111.「そのときこそ 余の念願が かなう！\n 世界を飲み込む 死と破壊が 余の大作\:
And then, my wish will be fulfilled! The death and destruction that will engulf this world will be the final brushstroke to finish my
magnum opus, "The Creation of the World"!

258112.「失敗作が 転じて 最高傑作に！\n これぞ 至高の芸術！！:
A failure turned into a masterpiece! This is
art at its finest!

258113.「芸術のために おのが命すら 捨てるか……。:
You would sacrifice even your own life for the
sake of your art...?

258114.「はーっはっはっはぁ！\n 滅びの手としての命など 惜しくもない。:
Hahahahah! As the Hand of Perdition, I have no
regrets.

258115.「最期の作品 『世界創造』を\n 完成させる機会 逃してなるものかッ！:
I will not miss the opportunity to complete my
final work, "The Creation of the World"!

258116.「是が非でも やりとげる！\n ひとりの 芸術家としてなぁ！: I'll do whatever it takes! As an artist!

258117.「ならば 全力で止めるッ！ \n 貴様には 失敗作がお似合いだ。へぼ芸術家！:
Then I will stop you with all my might!
Failure suits you, you hack artist!

258119.「おのれ おのれ……魔勇者め！\n 道具ごときに 足を すくわれるとは……。:
Damn, you... Evil Hero! How could I allow
myself to be tripped up by own tool...?

258120.「動けば 斬る。敗北を 受け入れよ。:
Make one move and I'll cut you down where you
stand. Accept your defeat.

258121.「ええーいッ！ 未完の作品を\n 仕上げる好機が……芸術が……ぐぬぁあああ！:
Arrrggh! My chance to complete my unfinished
work... my art... gnnnnggh!!

258122.「勝敗は 決した！\n 護りの手よ 剣をおさめよ！:
This battle is over! Hand of Protection, lay
down your arms!

258123.「こたびの 破魂の審判。\n 護りの手の勝利と あいなった！:
In this Judgment of Souls, the Hand of
Protection has triumphed!

258124.「偽りの世界の保全は 約束されるであろう。:
The preservation of the false world shall now
be assured.

258125.「保全だと？ 芸術を 侮辱するなッ！\n 『世界創造』は 余の集大成であるぞ！:
Conservation? Don't insult my art! The
Creation of the World is the culmination of my
work!

258126.「くそう！ ここで 筆を置けというのか！\n 安定を欠いた 世界では ヒズミが発:
Damn it! You want me to put down my pen here! In a world that lacks stability, there will be a hitch. You're the one who said it should be
destroyed!

258127.「審判は下りました。\n 決定は くつがえりません。:
The judgement stands. The decision will not be
reversed.

258128.「さあ 護りの手よ。\n 最後のヒズミを 消してください。:
Come, O Hand of Protection. Make the last
hissy fit vanish.

258131.「おい！ 今 何をしたぁ！？: Hey! What did you just do?

258132.「渦を……暴走させた……。\n つられて ヒズミも暴走……。:
The vortex... went out of control... and so
did Hizumi...

258133.「間もなくだ……。破壊神の召喚は……。\n かならずや 余の『世界創造』を\n:
Soon the summoning of the God of Destruction
will surely finish my World Creation.

258134.「完成を 見たかっ……ぐふっ！: I wish I could have seen it finished.

258137.「何度も 見てきた。奴は ああやって\n 世界を破壊する力場……暗黒球を生みだし:
I've seen it many times. He creates a world-
destroying force field... a Dark Orb, and then
he hides inside to store up energy.

258138.「おい！ ぼーっとしてんじゃねえ！\n いったん 退くぞ！:
Hey! Hey! Don't just stand there! We're
leaving now!

258140.「相棒！ 何があったんだ！\n ヒズミは消せたか？:
Buddy! What the hell happened! Did you get rid
of Hizmet?

258142.「審判で勝ったのは 私たちだ。\n 破壊神の始末は お前たちが\n 責任をもって:
We won the judgement. You guys will be
responsible for dealing with the God of
Destruction, right?

258144.「破壊神は 世界を ブッ壊すための\n 装置みたいなもんだ……制御不能のな。:
The God of Destruction is like a device to
destroy the world... out of control.

258145.「無責任な！\n 破魂の審判を始めたのは お前たちだろう！:
Irresponsible! You are the ones who started
the Judge of Souls!

258146.「審判など やるべきではなかったんだ。: I should never have been a judgement.

258147.「未完のまま 放置された世界だ。\n ほっといても そこら中に ヒズミが発生し\:
It is a world left unfinished. Even if left alone, there would have been a few hiccups here and there, and it would have destroyed
itself eventually.

258148.「生き残るチャンスを 与えたんだ。\n 感謝されこそ 恨まれる筋合いはない。:
I gave you a chance to survive. You should be
grateful. You have no right to hold a grudge.

258149.「よくも ぬけぬけと……\n 自分たちには なんの落ち度もないと？:
How can you just stand there and say... that
there's nothing wrong with them?

258150.「滅びの手の暴走を 止められなかった。\n これは失態でした……しかし 私とメド:
I could not stop Ruin's Hand from going out of control. This was a blunder... but it is also true that Mednam and I cannot stop the God of
Destruction.

258151.「ですが あなたたちになら……\n あれを止められる可能性が あります。: But there's a chance you guys can stop it.

258152.「破壊神が閉じこもっている 暗黒球に侵入し\n 直接 戦いを いどむのです。:
They must break into the Dark Orb, where the
God of Destruction is locked up, and fight
directly against him.

258153.「暗黒球に入る手立てを 講じるには\n 少々 時間がいりますが……どうします？:
It will take some time to work out a way to
get into the Dark Orb, but... what do you
suggest?

258154.「聞くなよ。ほかに 方法はないんだろ？\n やるしかなかろう。:
Don't ask me. There's no other way, is there?
We have to do it.

258155.「滅びの手の 最後っ屁が きいてるようだな。\n ムリせず 俺らが準備してる間:
Looks like the last fart of Ruin's Hand is
coming. Take it easy and rest while we get
ready.

258156.「……ひとまず こちらが 破魂の審判で勝利した\n 報酬となります。お受け取りを:
...For now, here is the reward for winning the
Judgement of Souls. Please accept it.

258157.「急ぎ 暗黒球へ入れるよう 手配します。\n 準備が ととのい次第 ご連絡しまし:
We'll make arrangements for you to enter the
Dark Orb as soon as possible. We'll contact
you as soon as everything is ready.
